Abilene.KSLI (AM):
KSLI is an AM Classic Country radio station that serves the Abilene, Texas, area. The station is owned by Townsquare Media.
On Monday, March 1, 2010, the News/Talk format on KSLI moved to sister station KYYW. KSLI then began broadcasting the Classic Country format that had been on KYYW.
The station was owned by Gap Central Broadcasting, which bought the station from Clear Channel Communications in 2007.
